name: Personalized Safety Plan (fillable)
summary: Create a personalized plan to increase safety before, during, or after leaving an unsafe situation.
bullets: Identify safe contacts and places to go
List warning signs and safety steps
Pack an emergency bag (ID, keys, meds)
Plan for digital and phone safety
reminder: Review your plan regularly and update as situations change.

name: 30-Day Notice to Vacate (Lease)
summary: End your lease early if you are a survivor not living with the abuser.
bullets: Fill in your information and landlord details
Deliver signed notice to your landlord
reminder: Keep a copy for your records.

name: Co-Habitation Notice to Vacate
summary: Request early lease termination if you share your home with an abuser.
bullets: Deliver notice to your landlord or property manager
reminder: Keep a signed copy as proof.
